Author: cdgan
Content: A peak is produced by both up and down line.. I'm wondering when will be the peak for Google? It seems like its stock is growing or maybe just slow down on growing since it went for IPO. Something out of topic:- Biggest empires in China, Egypt, Rome, or even Adolf Hitler had their falls. When is Google stock's falling? What will be the factors? When the public gets bored of their acquistion without returns?

Title: Startup: Zero Cash, Zero Experience but Created Product

Content: iPhone is a marketing hype, whereas Nokia is a pure cellphone company. iPod made its payoff but not necessary iPhone

Title: Stanford: Top 10 Enduring Elements of High-Technology Entrepreneurship

Author: StStartup
Content:
Ofcourse some sort of captcha is necessary. If you are bothered about the looks, then the real question is what kind of captcha should you implement. You can go for the audio only captcha , or perhaps even a flash based visual one.

Repetitive captcha tests can be avoided if your application limits the frequenzy of submissions made . But this in turn is a larger annoyance for commenting systems.

Author: jamongkad
Title: Man I hate captchas!
Content: Do you guys think captchas are necessary? I think they just ruin the whole look of the website + they annoy users to high hell. Is there any way around the implementing of captchas?

Author: rchambers
Title: Tech Startup USA: 27 Web Companies in the Northeast
Content: Because of the virtual ease of accessing information and services from anywhere on the planet, it's sometimes easy to forget that web companies are real entities tethered to Earth-bound locales.

Author: thinkingserious
Title: Free Statistics to Help Your Business
Content: One key step in creating any business is understanding your market and competition. For those who don't have the big bucks to buy the marketing data you need, this is the resource for you.
